cd /tmp && /home/juan-all-hands/micromamba/bin/python -c "
import numpy as np
from astropy.io import fits
# Create VLA data
col = fits.Column('a', format='QD', array=[[0], [0, 0]])
hdu = fits.BinTableHDU.from_columns([col])
# Get the data arrays
arra = hdu.data['a']
arrb = hdu.data['a']  # Same data
print('Testing data type conditions:')
print('arra.dtype:', arra.dtype)
print('arrb.dtype:', arrb.dtype)
print('np.issubdtype(arra.dtype, np.floating):', np.issubdtype(arra.dtype, np.floating))
print('np.issubdtype(arrb.dtype, np.floating):', np.issubdtype(arrb.dtype, np.floating))
print('Both floating?', np.issubdtype(arra.dtype, np.floating) and np.issubdtype(arrb.dtype, np.floating))
print('\"P\" in col.format:', 'P' in col.format)
print('\"Q\" in col.format:', 'Q' in col.format)
# Check what path the code would take
if np.issubdtype(arra.dtype, np.floating) and np.issubdtype(arrb.dtype, np.floating):
    print('Would take floating point path')
elif 'P' in col.format:
    print('Would take P format VLA path')
else:
    print('Would take np.where path (problematic)')

cd /tmp && /home/juan-all-hands/micromamba/bin/python -c "
import numpy as np
from astropy.io import fits

# Create VLA data
col = fits.Column('a', format='QD', array=[[0], [0, 0]])
hdu = fits.BinTableHDU.from_columns([col])

# Get the data arrays
arra = hdu.data['a']
arrb = hdu.data['a']  # Same data

print('Testing data type conditions:')
print('arra.dtype:', arra.dtype)
print('arrb.dtype:', arrb.dtype)
print('np.issubdtype(arra.dtype, np.floating):', np.issubdtype(arra.dtype, np.floating))
print('np.issubdtype(arrb.dtype, np.floating):', np.issubdtype(arrb.dtype, np.floating))
print('Both floating?', np.issubdtype(arra.dtype, np.floating) and np.issubdtype(arrb.dtype, np.floating))
print('\"P\" in col.format:', 'P' in col.format)
print('\"Q\" in col.format:', 'Q' in col.format)

# Check what path the code would take
if np.issubdtype(arra.dtype, np.floating) and np.issubdtype(arrb.dtype, np.floating):
    print('Would take floating point path')
elif 'P' in col.format:
    print('Would take P format VLA path')
else:
    print('Would take np.where path (problematic)')
"
